#InputHook

*Before r366 this was called FakeAPI, and before r348 it uses Microsoft Research Detours.*

= InputHook =

InputHook is a [http://easyhook.codeplex.com EasyHook] based hook system for replacing  gamepad data returned form system by application with fake data.

That allow many games to work with x360ce.

= HookMode =
HookMode option selects between Normal, Compatibility and Disabled states of InputHook.

For most games Normal mode is recommended, it replace only some data to make gamepad "looks like" is XInput compatible.

Compatibility mode replace additional data, is needed for some games that filter DirectInput devices from XInput devices. Also change name of gamepad to "XBOX 360 Controller (for Windows)".
